Nginx.description:
Open source web server for HTTP, HTTPS, SMTP, POP3, and IMAP protocols, as well as a load balancer, HTTP cache, and a reverse proxy server. Rock-on guide

Advanced users only: You must add a default config file to your Nginx Config [e.g. nginx-config] Share.

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
Nginx.more_info:
You must create a default config file in the Config Storage share before starting this Rockon, which you can extend with your own custom configuration.
For advanced users, an example configuration file can be found in the nginx wiki.

/usr/share/nginx/html.description: Document root for HTML, JavaScript, etc.
/usr/share/nginx/html.label: Served Content [e.g. nginx-data]
